markdownRemark.html:
Via an all encompassing comfort,
A grave distaste is staved against,
Life over death on a cold night,
Amid beauty of flame formed sights,
Her gold heart found to be dazzling,
Until there's but embers glowing,
Before us naked flames beckon,
While there is dancing felt on skin,
Ravenous desire ablaze,
Catching you up in an embrace,
By her sweet side one's sure to stay,
Waiting for the first light of day,
A sweltering sanctuary,
Causing reddening of your cheeks,
My sweet lay here with me to sleep,
Close your eyes and sleep contently.

Via an all encompassing comfort,  
A grave distaste is staved against,  
Life over death on a cold night,  
Amid beauty of flame formed sights,  
Her gold heart found to be dazzling,  
Until there's but embers glowing,  
Before us naked flames beckon,  
While there is dancing felt on skin,  
Ravenous desire ablaze,  
Catching you up in an embrace,  
By her sweet side one's sure to stay,  
Waiting for the first light of day,  
A sweltering sanctuary,  
Causing reddening of your cheeks,  
My sweet lay here with me to sleep,  
Close your eyes and sleep contently.
